topic.title: Auto Provision
topic.shortdesc: Release notes for Auto Provision on Yeastar Cloud PBX Instance.

ul.li:
Added support for the following IP phones:
Snom: D120, D305, D375, D712, D715, D725, D745, and D765.
Yealink: SIP-T41U, SIP-T43U, SIP-T46U, and SIP-T48U.
For Snom phones (D1XX series, D3XX series, and D7XX series): Added Administrator Mode, Administrator Password, HTTP Server Username, and HTTP Server Password settings on the Preference page.
Fixed the issue of Default Template: The drop-down list of Series/Model couldn't be expanded on the default template page.

section.title: Version 1.8.4
section.p:
Released Date: September 18, 2019
Added support for the following IP phones:
Snom: D735 and D717
Yealink: VP59, CP960, and CP920
Optimized DSS settings on Fanvil phones (X5/X5G, X4/X4G, X5S and X6): Added Action URL type of DSS key.
Optimized settings on Snom phones (D315, D345 and D385): Added the Tone Scheme setting on Preference page.
Fixed the auto provision template issue of Fanvil phones: the value of <language> parameter in the template was inaccuracy.
Fixed the phonebook issue on Yealink W60B: Only 5 handsets could download the phonebook from PBX after auto provisioning.
Fixed the issue of custom template: Custom template did not take effect if you add devices in bulk or import auto provisioning file.

ul.li: Optimized DSSKey/Line Key setting: The Value field is allowed to enter maximum 255 characters.

li.p: Optimized Account settings for IP phones: The extension Caller ID Name will be automatically filled in the Label field.

p.note: In the earlier version, the extension number will be automatically filled in the Label field.

ul.li: Fixed the issue of Auto Provision Template: The special characters %cn in the custom template could not be identified correctly and would be deleted.
Fixed the issue of Auto Provisioning Device List page: The Auto Provisioning Device List could not display if the assigned extension name contained a line break.

li.p: Fixed the DSSkey issue on Fanvil: The DSSkey setting could not take effect when the DSSkey Line is set to Auto.
Fixed the issue of Auto Provision Template: The setting in Other tab would be cleared if the characters ` was contained in the custom template.
Fixed the issue that the auto provisioning would be failed after restoring configurations from a backup file.

ul.li: Updated Russian and Italian web interface.
Optimized Auto Provisioning template: Blank spaces are allowed in the Name filed.

li.p: Fixed the Auto Provisioning template issue: The customized parameters on the template would be lost.
Fixed Auto Provisioning template issue: A template error would occur if the special character & was contained in the customized parameters.

ul.li: Added support for Yealink phones: SIP-T53, SIP-T53W, SIP-T54W, and SIP-T57W.
Added support for Snom phones: D315, D345, D385, and D785.
Fixed Auto Provisioning might not take effect.
Added support for Fanvil phones: C400, C600, X1, X1P, X2, X2C, X3S, X3G, X4, X5G, X5S, X6, H5.
Improved the Web security.
Added support for Vtech phones: ET635 and ET605.
Added support for Yealink phones: T40G, W60P, W53P, W41P, W52P and W56P.
Added support for configuring iLBC_13_33kbps and iLBC_15_2kbps on Yealink phones.
Added support for configuring "User Password" on Vtech phones.
Optimized time settings on Yealink phone and Vtech phone: The default time zone and NTP server on the phones are the same as the PBX settings.
Fixed the issue that adding contacts on Auto Provisioning web page would cause excessive CPU consumption.
Added support for the Vtech phones: ET685, VDP650, VCS752, VCS754.
This version of Auto Provisioning is compatible with the cloud PBX version 81.5.0.7.
Supported Yealink phones that have MAC addresses with 805ec0.
Fixed the issue that auto provision might not take effect.
This version of Auto Provisioning is compatible with the cloud PBX version 81.2.0.8.
